title.en: Unsupervised Pixel-Level Wafer Map Anomaly Detection
title.zh: 无监督像素级晶圆图异常检测

description.en: Designed a student–teacher feature pyramid distillation framework enhanced with an Efficient Dual Attention (EDA) module to refine multi-scale features and improve pixel-level localization. The model is trained only on normal wafers and flags anomalies via feature discrepancies during inference. Results: On WM-811K and MixedWM38, it achieved AUROC 99.65% / 99.35%, with strong AUPR/AUPRO and real-time feasibility (3.204 FPS reported).
description.zh: 设计了一种增强型师生特征金字塔蒸馏框架，融入高效双重注意力（EDA）模块，以优化多尺度特征并提升像素级定位能力。该模型仅使用正常晶圆样本进行训练，在推理阶段通过特征差异识别异常。实验结果：在WM-811K与MixedWM38数据集上，分别实现了99.65%与99.35%的AUROC值，同时具备优异的AUPR/AUPRO指标与实时可行性（报告吞吐量为3.204 FPS）。

en: No defect-mask supervision required (train on normal wafers)
High detection and localization performance (AUROC up to 99%+)
Designed for practical deployment with efficient inference
zh: 无需缺陷掩模监督（仅使用正常晶圆进行训练）
具备高检测与定位性能（报道的AUROC最高可达99%以上）
专为实际部署设计，推理效率高。

title.zh: 半监督晶圆图缺陷分割

description.en: Developed a semi-supervised segmentation pipeline for wafer-map defects where labeled masks are limited. The approach generates stronger pseudo-labels using cross-attention across multiple feature scales and stabilizes training with multi-scale consistency under weak/strong augmentations.
description.zh: 开发了一种用于晶圆图缺陷的半监督分割管线，适用于标注掩模有限的场景。该方法通过跨多个特征尺度的跨注意力机制生成更强的伪标签，并通过弱/强增强下的多尺度一致性来稳定训练过程。

en: Reduces dependency on labeled data for segmentation.
Improves segmentation on mixed/overlapping defect patterns.
Reported gains of about +12% mIoU and +10% F1-score on MixedWM38
zh: 减少对标注数据的依赖。
提升混合/重叠缺陷图样的分割效果。
在MixedWM38数据集上报道mIoU提升约12%，F1-score提升约10%。

title.en: Zero-Shot Wafer Map Defect Retrieval (Unseen Categories)
title.zh: 零样本晶圆图缺陷检索（未知类别）

description.en: Built a retrieval system that matches wafer-map defects even when the defect type was not seen during training. The model combines fine-grained and global representations using a dual-branch multi-scale ViT design, and trains with metric learning to produce strong embedding space separation for retrieval and clustering.
description.zh: 构建了一种检索系统，能够匹配在训练期间未见过的晶圆图缺陷类型。该模型采用双分支多尺度ViT设计，结合细粒度与全局特征表示，并通过度量学习进行训练，以实现强大的嵌入空间分离，用于检索与聚类。

en: Supports unseen defect categories through embedding-based retrieval.
Strong retrieval and clustering results reported (e.g., Recall@K and NMI improvements).
Designed for practical similarity search and defect pattern management.
zh: 支持通过嵌入式检索识别未知缺陷类别。
报道了强有力的检索与聚类结果（例如Recall@K和NMI的提升）。
专为实际的相似性搜索和缺陷图样管理设计。

title.en: Exemplar-Free Class-Incremental Wafer Map Defect Recognition
title.zh: 无示例类增量晶圆图缺陷识别

description.en: Designed an incremental learning framework that learns new defect classes over time without storing old samples. The method uses transformer-based feature fusion and proxy-guided distillation to reduce forgetting while keeping the model adaptable to new defect patterns.
description.zh: 设计了一种增量学习框架，能够随着时间学习新的缺陷类别而无需存储旧样本。该方法采用基于变换器的特征融合和代理引导的蒸馏技术，以减少遗忘，同时保持模型对新缺陷图样的适应能力。

en: Reduces catastrophic forgetting in long training sequences.
Suitable for evolving defect taxonomies and data-retention constraints.
zh: 无示例设置（无需重放缓冲区）。
减少长训练序列中的灾难性遗忘。
适用于不断发展的缺陷分类和数据保留限制。
